name: Wood Puzzle - Block Pop
description:
Wood Puzzle is a classic block game. Wood Puzzle is simple and addictive,.
To crush more blocks and get more score.
Once you start, you will love this wood puzzle game.
Let’s enjoy this wood puzzle game.

Features of wood puzzle
* Easy to play, difficult to master
* Beautiful Wooden style blocks and scene
* More wood block styles to choose
* Cool animations and Game sounds
* Support leaderboards and No time limits
* The game progress is automatically saved
* Pleasurable for all ages With Beginner's guide
* No wifi needed, you can play it anywhere

How to play wood puzzle
* Drag the blocks into the grid and to fill rows and columns
* In Bomb Mode, the blocks can fall when energy is full
* The blocks can not be rotated

Let’s Enjoy This Wood Puzzle Game.
